frontmatter.title: Refactoring Java EE Applications
frontmatter.description: A example of refactoring a Java EE Application to Micro Services

internal.content:
--- title: Refactoring Java EE Applications description: A example of refactoring a Java EE Application to Micro Services --- export const Title = () => ( Refactoring Java EE Applications

A phased approach to refactoring a Monolith in to Micro Services

 ); Modernizing the backend JEE code Introduction Move the backend monolith to OpenLiberty Summary ## Introduction In this phase the JEE6 EJB code is modernized to use MicroProfile and is then able to run on the latest open source version of Liberty (OpenLiberty) ### Move the backend monolith to OpenLiberty ![Step 5](images/step5.png) ## Summary This application has been refactored in a series of steps from the original [WebSphere ND v8.5.5 version](https://github.com/ibm-cloud-architecture/cloudpak-for-applications/tree/was855) to run as Micro Services on Red Hat OpenShift.
